text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-account-billing-status-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 7 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://hl7.org/fhir/account-billing-status5.0.0  billingBillingIndicates that all transactions are recorded and the finance system can perform the billing process, including preparing insurance claims, scrubbing charges, invoicing etc. During this time any new charges will not be included in the current billing run/cycle. (account.status is active)
http://hl7.org/fhir/account-billing-status5.0.0  carecomplete-notbilledCareComplete/Not BilledThe account.status is still active and may have charges recorded against it (only for events in the servicePeriod), however the encounters associated are completed. (Also known as Discharged not billed) This BillingStatus is often not used in ongoing accounts. (account.status is active)
http://hl7.org/fhir/account-billing-status5.0.0  closed-baddebtClosed-Bad DebtThe balance of this debt has not been able to be recovered, and the organization has decided not to persue debt recovery. (account.status is in-active)
http://hl7.org/fhir/account-billing-status5.0.0  closed-combinedClosed-CombinedThis account has been merged into another account, all charged have been migrated. This account should no longer be used, and will not be billed. (account.status is i n-active)
http://hl7.org/fhir/account-billing-status5.0.0  closed-completedClosed-CompletedThe account is closed and all charges are processed and accounted for. (account.status is i n-active)
http://hl7.org/fhir/account-billing-status5.0.0  closed-voidedClosed-VoidedThe account was not created in error, however the organization has decided that it will not be charging any transactions associated. (account.status is i n-active)
http://hl7.org/fhir/account-billing-status5.0.0  openOpenThe account is open for charging transactions (account.status is active)

name: R5AccountBillingStatusForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.AccountBillingStatus for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/account-billing-status|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/account-billing-status|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `Account.billingStatus`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/account-billing-status|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
